title: Love of Aurora
overview:
A romantic series about modern urban youth, their relationships, aspirations, victories and disappointments.
The main character is the heir of a large company, constantly vying with his half-brother. 
The main character has recently returned after studying abroad to take care of sick mother. Girl wants to become an actress and puts a lot of effort to dream. 
They know each other from school, but at the beginning of the relationship they have is not very slow. However, over time, feelings change.
